jobDescription: VML is all about putting everything you are into everything you do. We're a full-service advertising agency that thrives on moving brands forward by inspiring a human connection.  We’re looking for a Data Insights expert who can make information inspiring to our clients and internal teams. As a Senior Insights Analyst, you will play an important role in discovering, analyzing and presenting insights related to consumer behaviors and perception, across website and social media channels. This includes driving strategic thinking and being the source of vital insights for brand planning, digital marketing and supporting standard internal data needs for clients and new business while creating stories from data.  The Data Insights Team is responsible for the assimilation of both qualitative and quantitative information; this position requires the ability to analyze both and make them actionable in a marketing context. Creativity in presentation and strategic thinking is a plus.Responsibilities
